      Parameters:
      intId - Scooter ID.
      dblBatteryPerc - Scooter Battery Percentage.
      strDesignation - Scooter Designation.
      dblPotency - Scooter Potency.
      dblWeight - Scooter Weight.
      dblMaxPayload - Scooter Maximum Payload.
      intBatteryCapacity - Scooter Battery Capacity.
      dblBatteryVoltage - Scooter Battery Voltage.
      dblEfficiency - Scooter Efficiency.
      Returns:
      true if the Scooter is updated. False if otherwise.
